newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Concord Land new issue price HK$3.48.
newsitem.headline: Concord Land new issue price HK$3.48.

text.p: Concord Land Development Co Ltd, the property arm of Pacific Concord Holdings Ltd, said on Sunday its new issue share price was finalised at HK$3.48.
The company said in a statement that 85 percent of the 300 million new shares were placed with instititional investors and 15 percent offered to the public.
Both the international placing and the public offering were oversubscribed, the statement said without elaborating.
Dealing in the shares was expected to begin on November 7, the company said earlier.
It plans to use the approximately HK$800 million raised to develop shopping malls in major Chinese cities.
